entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Point Lepreau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:09 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 8.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Point Lepreau 12:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023
Temperature: 8.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 8.1°C
Wind: S 32 km/h gust 46 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Rain at times heavy. High 11.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Fog patches. Amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along the coast early this afternoon. High 11. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Fog patches. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few showers. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain in the morning and early in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023
